title: Black Market Dealer
description: A mysterious figure offers you a power potion.

choice_1.text: Buy it (-20 Gold, +2 Atk to random gladiator)

title: Traveling Healer
description: A wandering healer offers his services to your ludus.

choice_1.text: Hire him (-15 Gold, fully heal one gladiator)

title: Food Caravan
description: A merchant caravan passes through with surplus supplies.

choice_1.text: Trade gold for food (-10 Gold, +40 Food)

choice_2.text: Rob the caravan (+30 Food, risk gladiator injury)

title: Arena Sponsor
description: A wealthy senator wants to sponsor your next fight.

title: Escaped Slave
description: A runaway slave begs for shelter at your ludus.

choice_1.text: Take him in (free Slave added to roster)

title: Training Grounds Fire
description: A fire breaks out in the training area!

choice_2.text: Let it burn (random gladiator loses 20 HP)

title: Veteran Trainer
description: An old gladiator master offers to train your fighters.

choice_1.text: Hire him (-30 Gold, +5 Atk to all gladiators)
